trans-unit.source: Defines an MSBuild task that extracts a type library from an Office customization assembly into a DLL to enable interop with Visual Basic for Applications (VBA).
trans-unit.target: 定义一个 MSBuild 任务，该任务将类型库从 Office 自定义程序集中提取到 DLL，以启用与 Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) 的互操作。

trans-unit.source: Set all of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary> properties and then call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.Execute%2A> to run this task.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary>属性，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.Execute%2A>若要运行此任务。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Build Engine uses <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks> to build and deploy Office solutions.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Build Engine 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks>生成和部署 Office 解决方案。

trans-unit.source: However, you can create your own build system by using these classes and the MSBuild XML-based project files.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以使用这些类并基于 MSBuild XML 项目文件来创建你自己生成系统。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [MSBuild Reference](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[MSBuild 参考](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the assembly from which to extract the type library.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要从中提取类型库的程序集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> that represents the assembly from which to extract the type library.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> ，它表示要从中提取类型库的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Extracts a type library from an Office customization assembly into a file, and embeds that file as an unmanaged resource into an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 将类型库从 Office 自定义程序集提取到文件，并将该文件作为非托管资源嵌入到程序集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type library has been embedded into an assembly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型库已嵌入到程序集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the cryptographic key container.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置加密密钥容器的路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the path to the cryptographic key container.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示加密密钥容器的路径。

trans-unit.source: To generate a key file, type the following command at the Visual Studio command prompt: `sn -k` *file*
trans-unit.target: 若要生成的密钥文件，在 Visual Studio 命令提示符下键入以下命令： `sn -k` *文件*

trans-unit.source: To install the key file into a container, type the following command: `sn -k`*file containerName*
trans-unit.target: 若要将密钥文件安装到容器中，键入以下命令： `sn -k`*文件容器名称*

trans-unit.source: Use either the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.KeyFile%2A> or the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.KeyContainer%2A> for strong name signing of assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用两种<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.KeyFile%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.KeyContainer%2A>以进行强名称签名的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the cryptographic key file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置加密密钥文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the path to the cryptographic key file.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，表示到加密的密钥文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: To generate a key file, type the following command at the Visual Studio command prompt: `sn -k` *file*
trans-unit.target: 若要生成的密钥文件，在 Visual Studio 命令提示符下键入以下命令： `sn -k` *文件*

trans-unit.source: Use either the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.KeyFile%2A> or the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.KeyContainer%2A> for strong name signing of assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用两种<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.KeyFile%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.KeyContainer%2A>以进行强名称签名的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of MSBuild items that can be consumed and emitted by tasks.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可由任务使用和发出的 MSBuild 项的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type library name that is extracted from the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.Assembly" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置从 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.EmbedTypeLibrary.Assembly" /> 中提取的类型库名称。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> that represents the DLL file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />表示 DLL 文件。

trans-unit.source: If the type library name is not provided, the task creates the file by using the assembly's name with the extension .tlb.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供类型库名称，该任务通过使用程序集的名称和扩展.tlb 创建该文件。
